Title: Saatchya Aat Gharat
Writer: Sanjay Soorkar (story), Nishikant Kamat (screenplay), Sanjay Pawar (screenplay), Sanjay Pawar (dialogue)
Actors: Bharti Achrekar, Makarand Anaspure, Vibhawari Deshpande, Bharat Ganeshpure
Plot: A group of young boys and girls grapple with moral issues in a changing world.
